data.comment: The match has started.
Goias's Daniel Bessa has been booked in Curitiba.
In the minute 23, Leo Cittadini is on a sub for Fernando Canesin for Paranaense.
Vitinho puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Halter.
In the minute 42, Jonathan for Paranaense has been booked by Diego Pombo Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
Goias have been given a penalty...
The first-half has come to a close in Curitiba.
Thiago Heleno is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Curitiba. Daniel Bessa converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
Diego Pombo Lopez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Douglas Baggio is replacing Thalles for the away team.
Goias make their second substitution with Juan Pintado replacing Yago Rocha.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 51, Goias have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Lucas Halter (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 66, Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Carlos Eduardo replacing Vinicius Mingotti.
Goal! Paranaense have got their heads in front thanks to a Carlos Eduardo strike.
Vitinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Daniel Bessa with Ignacio Jara.
Goias make their fourth substitution with Miguel Figueira replacing Luiz Gustavo.
The away team replace Vinicius Lopes with Zeca.
In the minute 89, At Arena da Baixada, Rafael Vaz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Diego Pombo Lopez blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Richard is replacing Marquinhos Gabriel for the home team.
Geuvanio is on a sub for Vitinho for Paranaense.
Victor Andrade (Goias) has received a first yellow card.
